en.site.title: Kima Academy - Program for Entrepreneurial Leadership Management (ELM)
en.pillars.quote: Lead with Confidence. Build with Impact.
en.pillars.title: Three core pillars
en.pillars.intro: Our intensive Leadership Entrepreneurial Management program bridges the gap between potential and performance through three core pillars:
en.pillar1.title: Conscious Leadership
en.pillar1.desc: Leadership isn't inherited. It's built. Master frameworks and transition from manager to conscious leader.
en.pillar2.title: Value-Driven Entrepreneurship
en.pillar2.desc: Entrepreneurship is a mindset of creating value. Develop opportunity recognition and drive innovation in any context.
en.pillar3.title: Professional Management
en.pillar3.desc: Your vision means nothing if you can't communicate it. Perfect storytelling, persuasion, and executive presence.
en.outcomes.subtitle: OUTCOMES & ELM
en.outcomes.title: What You'll Gain & Become ELM Certified
en.outcomes.intro.p1: KIMA ELM program doesn't just train. It transforms how you think and the way you drive change.
en.outcomes.intro.p2: Kima Academy accelerates your growth, turning ambition into execution, potential into results, and managers into leaders who create lasting value.
en.outcomes.benefit1: Practical tools and strategic frameworks developed by IVY-League schools while adapted to local culture
en.outcomes.benefit2: Confidence to make complex decisions from day one
en.outcomes.benefit3: Proven methodologies adapted for real-world challenges
en.outcomes.benefit4: A clear path from manager to impactful leader
en.flowchart.title: What is your next leadership Level?
en.flowchart.node1.title: Industry Expert to Executive
en.flowchart.node1.subtitle: Shift from specialized to executive oversight
en.flowchart.node2.title: Mid-Level Manager to C-Level
en.flowchart.node2.subtitle: Move from team to enterprise leadership
en.flowchart.node3.title: C-Level to CEO
en.flowchart.node3.subtitle: Advance to ultimate organizational responsibility
en.flowchart.node4.title: Founder to Leader
en.flowchart.node4.subtitle: Transition from creating to leading
en.flowchart.node5.title: Accelerators & Partners
en.flowchart.node5.subtitle: Join Kima accelerators and partners
en.multitrack.title: A multi-track Approach to Leadership Excellence
en.multitrack.item1.title: Intensive Leadership Sessions
en.multitrack.item1.desc: 6 high-impact sessions at Hertzlia, in the heart of the High tech center.
en.multitrack.item2.title: Personal Mentoring Sessions
en.multitrack.item2.desc: 8 Individual Trainings specifically designed for your unique professional challenges and aspirations.
en.multitrack.item3.title: LEM Certificate
en.multitrack.item3.desc: Become LEM certified and a member of the KIMA LEM Leadership network.
en.multitrack.item4.title: Personal Podcast
en.multitrack.item4.desc: Optional: Personal podcast recording that expresses your leadership identity, to be used as a professional tool in your resume storytelling.
en.register.subtitle: REGISTER NOW
en.register.title: ELM -Mini Program
en.register.location.label: Location
en.register.location.text: Herzliya, an inspiring tech environment designed to foster creativity and focused learning
en.register.investment.label: Investment
en.register.investment.note: Comprehensive training including all external sessions, personal mentoring, and program materials
en.register.outcome.label: Outcome
en.register.outcome.text: Advancing to executive leadership level, equipped to build and expand successful ventures
en.register.startdate.label: Start Date
en.register.startdate.text: The program begins on February 16, 2025. Meetings twice a month on Monday.
en.register.tagline: Don't let lack of experience hold you back. Your entrepreneurial journey starts here.

en.register.cta.title: Kima Academy Program for Entrepreneurial Leadership Management
